titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on numerous other seals made of rubber or silicone, and covered with, or reinforced with, a fabric material.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/8/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on numerous other seals made of rubber or silicone, and covered with, or reinforced with, a fabric material.
